I can say without a doubt that this game is not the worst.
Probably the best fps ever made. Literally forever replayable with a skill ceiling so high only a few talented players have ever reached the top. Also a super fun game to play with friends at 1 am.
Fun Game hard to master, don't rage and just have fun :)
A great game, great community, and an overall fun experience
